description: This is the ultimate rolling camera bag. The Roadie meets U.S. domestic and many international carry-on requirements, and it fits a large camera kit with a multitude of accessories. A padded front pocket holds a laptop up to 17-inches, and a removable collar secures any size tripod to the front of the case. The capacious interior will fit multiple configurations of Cinevate's DSLR Rig, plus additional gear. Smooth- and silent-rolling ball bearing wheels are user replaceable. Fits 1-2 DSLRs plus 7-9 lenses.
title: Cinevate CNADNA000021 Canon - Nikon Adapter (Black)
